me.soxey6.engine.main

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.soxey6.engine.main.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The game class is the entire game in a single class that can be created with an instance.
    Version:
    Dev-0.0.2
    Author:
    Pat Childs || Soxey6

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String gameName)
        The game object is the whole game itself. Creating a new one will create a new game. Note: This can have numerous instances at once.
        Parameters:
        String - gameName
